name: organic-food
description: food products that are grown and processed without synthetic additives.

name: gourmet
description: high-quality, specialty food products.

name: asian-food
description: food products originating from various asian cuisines.

name: snacks
description: products meant for casual eating between meals.

name: baked-goods
description: products made through baking, including various types of bread and pastries.

name: seafood
description: products from marine life, including fish and shellfish.

name: dairy-products
description: products made from milk and other dairy sources.

name: clothing
description: various types of apparel for different occasions.

name: electronics
description: devices and gadgets for various technological needs.

name: machines
description: various types of machinery for different industrial needs.

name: shoes
description: footwear for various activities and fashion needs.

name: fast-food
description: quickly prepared food items typically served in fast-food restaurants.

name: street-food
description: food sold by vendors in public places, often providing quick, affordable meals.

name: urban-eats
description: trendy and contemporary food options popular in urban areas.

name: health-food
description: nutritious food options that promote overall well-being.

name: spices
description: aromatic substances used to flavor and preserve food.

name: noodles
description: a type of pasta made from wheat or rice flour, often used in asian cuisine.

name: desserts
description: sweet treats enjoyed at the end of a meal.

name: fresh-produce
description: raw fruits and vegetables that are fresh and unprocessed.

name: plant-based
description: foods derived from plants, excluding animal products.

name: artisanal-bread
description: bread made with various artisanal techniques for unique flavors and textures.

name: frozen-food
description: a category that includes frozen products for convenience and preservation.

name: meat-poultry
description: a variety of meat and poultry products, including different preparations and cuts.

name: fashion
description: trends and styles in clothing and accessories.

name: tech-accessories
description: various accessories designed to complement and enhance technology devices.

name: luxury
description: high-end products that offer exclusivity and superior quality.

name: formal-wear
description: elegant clothing suitable for formal occasions.

name: casual-wear
description: comfortable clothing suitable for everyday wear.

name: athletic-wear
description: clothing designed for physical exercise and sports.

name: high-tech
description: advanced technology products with cutting-edge features.

name: gourmet-food-trucks
description: food trucks offering high-quality, specialty food items.
